# gain

**Instance Property**

The overall level for all sounds of an audio mix group in relative decibels.

## Declaration

```swift
var gain: Audio.Decibel { get set }
```

## Discussion

The gain is a value in the range `[-.infinity, .zero]`, where `-.infinity` is silent and `.zero` is nominal.
title: gain
